EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.label: Entity Common Stock, Shares Outstanding
EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.description: Indicate number of shares or other units outstanding of each of registrant's classes of capital or common stock or other ownership interests, if and as stated on cover of related periodic report. Where multiple classes or units exist define each class/interest by adding class of stock items such as Common Class A [Member], Common Class B [Member] or Partnership Interest [Member] onto the Instrument [Domain] of the Entity Listings, Instrument.

EntityPublicFloat.label: Entity Public Float
EntityPublicFloat.description: The aggregate market value of the voting and non-voting common equity held by non-affiliates computed by reference to the price at which the common equity was last sold, or the average bid and asked price of such common equity, as of the last business day of the registrant's most recently completed second fiscal quarter.

MortgageLoansOnRealEstateFaceAmountOfMor.label: SEC Schedule, 12-29, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Face Amount of Mortgages
MortgageLoansOnRealEstateFaceAmountOfMor.description: Amount of contractual principal due at origination of mortgage loan within investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate.

MortgageLoansOnRealEstateInterestRate.label: SEC Schedule, 12-29, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Interest Rate
MortgageLoansOnRealEstateInterestRate.description: Interest rate of mortgage loan within investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate.

MortgageLoansOnRealEstateNumberOfLoans.label: SEC Schedule, 12-29, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Number of Loans
MortgageLoansOnRealEstateNumberOfLoans.description: Number of mortgage loans within investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate.

MortgageLoansOnRealEstatePriorLiens1.label: SEC Schedule, 12-29, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Prior Lien, Amount
MortgageLoansOnRealEstatePriorLiens1.description: Amount of prior lien on real estate securing mortgage loan within investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate.

RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationAmou.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Amount of Encumbrances
RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationAmou.description: Amount of lien or mortgage outstanding on real estate investment properties for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

AccountsAndNotesReceivableNet.label: Accounts and Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss
AccountsAndNotesReceivableNet.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of accounts and financing receivable. Includes, but is not limited to, notes and loan receivable.

AccountsPayableAndAccruedLiabilitiesCurr.label: Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities, Current
AccountsPayableAndAccruedLiabilitiesCurr.description: Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and due within one year (or the operating cycle, if longer), including liabilities incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received, taxes, interest, rent and utilities, accrued salaries and bonuses, payroll taxes and fringe benefits.

AccretionAmortizationOfDiscountsAndPremi.label: Accretion (Amortization) of Discounts and Premiums, Investments
AccretionAmortizationOfDiscountsAndPremi.description: The sum of the periodic adjustments of the differences between securities' face values and purchase prices that are charged against earnings. This is called accretion if the security was purchased at a discount and amortization if it was purchased at premium. As a noncash item, this element is an adjustment to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossN.label: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossN.description: Accumulated change in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from non-owner sources, net of tax effect, at period end. Excludes Net Income (Loss), and accumulated changes in equity from transactions resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners. Includes foreign currency translation items, certain pension adjustments, unrealized gains and losses on certain investments in debt and equity securities, other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses related to factors other than credit losses on available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities that an entity does not intend to sell and it is not more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell before recovery of the amortized cost basis, as well as changes in the fair value of derivatives related to the effective portion of a designated cash flow hedge.

AdditionalPaidInCapital.label: Additional Paid in Capital
AdditionalPaidInCapital.description: Excess of issue price over par or stated value of the entity's capital stock and amounts received from other transactions involving the entity's stock or stockholders. Includes adjustments to additional paid in capital. Some examples of such adjustments include recording the issuance of debt with a beneficial conversion feature and certain tax consequences of equity instruments awarded to employees. Use this element for the aggregate amount of additional paid-in capital associated with common and preferred stock. For additional paid-in capital associated with only common stock, use the element additional paid in capital, common stock. For additional paid-in capital associated with only preferred stock, use the element additional paid in capital, preferred stock.

AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesPeriodIncr.label: Allowance for Loan and Lease Losses, Period Increase (Decrease)
AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesPeriodIncr.description: Amount of increase (decrease) of allowance reserve for credit loss.

AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesRealEstate.label: Allowance for Loan and Lease Losses, Real Estate
AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesRealEstate.description: The reserve to cover probable credit losses related to specifically identified fixed maturity real estate loans as well as probable credit losses inherent in the remainder of that loan portfolio.

AmortizationOfAboveAndBelowMarketLeases.label: Amortization of above and below Market Leases
AmortizationOfAboveAndBelowMarketLeases.description: Amount of non-cash amortization of intangible asset (liability) for above and below market leases.

AmortizationOfDebtDiscountPremium.label: Amortization of Debt Discount (Premium)
AmortizationOfDebtDiscountPremium.description: Amount of noncash expense included in interest expense to amortize debt discount and premium associated with the related debt instruments. Excludes amortization of financing costs. Alternate captions include noncash interest expense.

AssetImpairmentCharges.label: Asset Impairment Charges
AssetImpairmentCharges.description: Amount of write-down of assets recognized in the income statement. Includes, but is not limited to, losses from tangible assets, intangible assets and goodwill.

Assets.label: Assets
Assets.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are recognized. Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

AssetsSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchaseRep.label: Assets Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Repurchase Liability
AssetsSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchaseRep.description: Amount to be repaid to the counterparty to the repurchase agreement when the carrying amount (or market value, if higher than the carrying amount) of securities or other assets sold under the repurchase agreement exceeds 10 percent of total assets.

BelowMarketLeaseNet.label: Below Market Lease, Net
BelowMarketLeaseNet.description: Amount after amortization of leases acquired as part of a real property acquisition at below market lease rate with a finite life.

BusinessCombinationContingentConsiderati.label: Business Combination, Contingent Consideration, Asset, Current
BusinessCombinationContingentConsiderati.description: Amount of asset recognized arising from contingent consideration in a business combination, expected to be realized within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

BusinessCombinationSeparatelyRecognizedT.label: Business Combination, Separately Recognized Transactions, Net Gains and Losses
BusinessCombinationSeparatelyRecognizedT.description: The net gains or losses recognized for each transaction with the acquiree that was recognized separately from the acquisition of assets and assumptions of liabilities in the business combination.

Cash.label: Cash
Cash.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

CashAcquiredFromAcquisition.label: Cash Acquired from Acquisition
CashAcquiredFromAcquisition.description: The cash inflow associated with the acquisition of business during the period (for example, cash that was held by the acquired business).

CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage. Excludes amount for disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Including Exchange Rate Effect
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash, cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; including effect from exchange rate change. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CommonStockDividendsPerShareDeclared.label: Common Stock, Dividends, Per Share, Declared
CommonStockDividendsPerShareDeclared.description: Aggregate dividends declared during the period for each share of common stock outstanding.

CommonStockNoParValue.label: Common Stock, No Par Value
CommonStockNoParValue.description: Face amount per share of no-par value common stock.

CommonStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.label: Common Stock, Par or Stated Value Per Share
CommonStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.description: Face amount or stated value per share of common stock.

CommonStockSharesAuthorized.label: Common Stock, Shares Authorized
CommonStockSharesAuthorized.description: The maximum number of common shares permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.

CommonStockSharesIssued.label: Common Stock, Shares, Issued
CommonStockSharesIssued.description: Total number of common shares of an entity that have been sold or granted to shareholders (includes common shares that were issued, repurchased and remain in the treasury). These shares represent capital invested by the firm's shareholders and owners, and may be all or only a portion of the number of shares authorized. Shares issued include shares outstanding and shares held in the treasury.

CommonStockSharesOutstanding.label: Common Stock, Shares, Outstanding
CommonStockSharesOutstanding.description: Number of shares of common stock outstanding. Common stock represent the ownership interest in a corporation.

CommonStockValue.label: Common Stock, Value, Issued
CommonStockValue.description: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable common stock (or common stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable common shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTax.label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income and other comprehensive income, attributable to parent entity. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxIncludingPort.label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxIncludingPort.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income and other comprehensive income. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

CostOfGoodsAndServicesSoldDepreciationAn.label: Cost, Depreciation and Amortization
CostOfGoodsAndServicesSoldDepreciationAn.description: Amount of expense for allocation of cost of tangible and intangible assets over their useful lives directly used in production of good and rendering of service.

DebtInstrumentFaceAmount.label: Debt Instrument, Face Amount
DebtInstrumentFaceAmount.description: Face (par) amount of debt instrument at time of issuance.

DeferredCreditsAndOtherLiabilitiesCurren.label: Deferred Credits and Other Liabilities, Current
DeferredCreditsAndOtherLiabilitiesCurren.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of unearned revenue or income, not otherwise specified in the taxonomy, which is expected to be taken into income during the current period and current obligations not separately disclosed in the balance sheet (other liabilities, current).

DeferredLeasingCommissions.label: Deferred Leasing Commissions
DeferredLeasingCommissions.description: Amount of unrecognized fee revenue received at the inception of a lease that is deferred and recognized over the life of the lease.

DepositLiabilityCurrent.label: Deposit Liability, Current
DepositLiabilityCurrent.description: The current portion, due within one year or one operating cycle, if longer, of deposits held other than customer deposits.

DepreciationAmortizationAndAccretionNet.label: Depreciation, Amortization and Accretion, Net
DepreciationAmortizationAndAccretionNet.description: The aggregate net amount of depreciation, amortization, and accretion recognized during an accounting period. As a noncash item, the net amount is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

DividendsCommonStock.label: Dividends, Common Stock
DividendsCommonStock.description: Amount of paid and unpaid common stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in cash, stock and payment-in-kind (PIK).

DividendsPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Dividends Payable
DividendsPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of dividends declared but unpaid on equity securities issued by the entity and outstanding.

DividendsPreferredStock.label: Dividends, Preferred Stock
DividendsPreferredStock.description: Amount of paid and unpaid preferred stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in cash, stock and payment-in-kind (PIK).

DividendsPreferredStockStock.label: Dividends, Preferred Stock, Stock
DividendsPreferredStockStock.description: Amount of paid and unpaid preferred stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in stock.

DueToAffiliateCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Due to Affiliate
DueToAffiliateCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Amount of payable due to an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

EarningsPerShareBasicAndDiluted.label: Earnings Per Share, Basic and Diluted
EarningsPerShareBasicAndDiluted.description: The amount of net income or loss for the period per each share in instances when basic and diluted earnings per share are the same amount and reported as a single line item on the face of the financial statements. Basic earnings per share is the amount of net income or loss for the period per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period. Diluted earnings per share includes the amount of net income or loss for the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.

EquityMethodInvestmentDividendsOrDistrib.label: Proceeds from Equity Method Investment, Distribution
EquityMethodInvestmentDividendsOrDistrib.description: Amount of distribution received from equity method investee for return on investment, classified as operating activities. Excludes distribution for return of investment, classified as investing activities.

EquityMethodInvestmentOwnershipPercentag.label: Equity Method Investment, Ownership Percentage
EquityMethodInvestmentOwnershipPercentag.description: The percentage of ownership of common stock or equity participation in the investee accounted for under the equity method of accounting.

EquityMethodInvestments.label: Equity Method Investments
EquityMethodInvestments.description: This item represents the carrying amount on the entity's balance sheet of its investment in common stock of an equity method investee. This is not an indicator of the fair value of the investment, rather it is the initial cost adjusted for the entity's share of earnings and losses of the investee, adjusted for any distributions (dividends) and other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses recognized.

EscrowDeposit.label: Escrow Deposit
EscrowDeposit.description: The designation of funds furnished by a borrower to a lender to assure future payments of the borrower's real estate taxes and insurance obligations with respect to a mortgaged property. Escrow deposits may be made for a variety of other purposes such as earnest money and contingent payments. This element excludes replacement reserves which are an escrow separately provided for within the US GAAP taxonomy.

FinanceLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRateP.label: Finance Lease, Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent
FinanceLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRateP.description: Weighted average discount rate for finance lease calculated at point in time.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on financing receivable. Excludes allowance for financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Recovery
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on financing receivable from recovery.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Writeoff
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of writeoff of financing receivable, charged against allowance for credit loss.

FinancingReceivableModificationsSubseque.label: Financing Receivable, Troubled Debt Restructuring, Subsequent Default, Number of Contracts
FinancingReceivableModificationsSubseque.description: Number of financing receivable contracts modified as troubled debt restructuring within previous 12 months, with subsequent payment default.

FinancingReceivableNonaccrualInterestInc.label: Financing Receivable, Nonaccrual, Interest Income
FinancingReceivableNonaccrualInterestInc.description: Amount of interest income on financing receivable on nonaccrual status.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, after Year Five
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for asset, excluding financial asset and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year One
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Remainder of Fiscal Year
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in remainder of current fiscal year.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Five
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Four
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Three
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Two
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsNet.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Net
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsNet.description: Amount after amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

GainLossOnTerminationOfLease.label: Gain (Loss) on Termination of Lease
GainLossOnTerminationOfLease.description: Amount of gain (loss) on termination of lease before expiration of lease term.

GainsLossesOnExtinguishmentOfDebt.label: Gain (Loss) on Extinguishment of Debt
GainsLossesOnExtinguishmentOfDebt.description: Difference between the fair value of payments made and the carrying amount of debt which is extinguished prior to maturity.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableInterestIncom.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, Interest Income, Accrual Method
ImpairedFinancingReceivableInterestIncom.description: Amount of interest income recognized that the financing receivables (with related allowance for credit losses and without a related allowance for credit losses) were impaired.

IncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestments.label: Income (Loss) from Equity Method Investments
IncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestments.description: Amount of income (loss) for proportionate share of equity method investee's income (loss).

IncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestmentsNet.label: Income (Loss) from Equity Method Investments, Net of Dividends or Distributions
IncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestmentsNet.description: This element represents the undistributed income (or loss) of equity method investments, net of dividends or other distributions received from unconsolidated subsidiaries, certain corporate joint ventures, and certain noncontrolled corporations; such investments are accounted for under the equity method of accounting. This element excludes distributions that constitute a return of investment, which are classified as investing activities.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableAndAccr.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableAndAccr.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amounts payable to vendors for goods and services received and the amount of obligations and expenses incurred but not paid.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedInterestReceiva.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accrued Interest Receivable, Net
IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedInterestReceiva.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due from borrowers for interest payments.

IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredRevenue.label: Increase (Decrease) in Deferred Revenue
IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredRevenue.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in deferred income and obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

IncreaseDecreaseInDepositOtherAssets.label: Increase (Decrease) in Deposit Assets
IncreaseDecreaseInDepositOtherAssets.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in moneys or securities given as security including, but not limited to, contract, escrow, or earnest money deposits, retainage (if applicable), deposits with clearing organizations and others, collateral, or margin deposits.

IncreaseDecreaseInDueToRelatedParties.label: Increase (Decrease) in Due to Related Parties
IncreaseDecreaseInDueToRelatedParties.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of obligations to be paid to the following types of related parties: a parent company and its subsidiaries; subsidiaries of a common parent; an entity and trust for the benefit of employees, such as pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entities' management; an entity and its principal owners, management, or member of their immediate families; affiliates; or other parties with the ability to exert significant influence.

IncreaseDecreaseInInterestPayableNet.label: Increase (Decrease) in Interest Payable, Net
IncreaseDecreaseInInterestPayableNet.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in interest payable, which represents the amount owed to note holders, bond holders, and other parties for interest earned on loans or credit extended to the reporting entity.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherDeposits.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Deposits
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherDeposits.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in deposit liabilities classified as other.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingAssets.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Operating Assets
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingAssets.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in operating assets classified as other.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingLiabilit.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Operating Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingLiabilit.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in operating liabilities classified as other.

IncreaseDecreaseInPayablesUnderRepurchas.label: Increase (Decrease) in Payables under Repurchase Agreements
IncreaseDecreaseInPayablesUnderRepurchas.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the liability under agreements to repurchase securities that were sold.

IntangibleAssetsNetExcludingGoodwill.label: Intangible Assets, Net (Excluding Goodwill)
IntangibleAssetsNetExcludingGoodwill.description: Sum of the carrying amounts of all intangible assets, excluding goodwill, as of the balance sheet date, net of accumulated amortization and impairment charges.

InterestAndDividendIncomeOperating.label: Interest and Dividend Income, Operating
InterestAndDividendIncomeOperating.description: Represents the total of interest and dividend income, including any amortization and accretion (as applicable) of discounts and premiums, earned from (1) loans and leases whether held-for-sale or held-in-portfolio; (2) investment securities; (3) federal funds sold; (4) securities purchased under agreements to resell; (5) investments in banker's acceptances, commercial paper, or certificates of deposit; (6) dividend income; or (7) other investments not otherwise specified herein.

InterestExpense.label: Interest Expense
InterestExpense.description: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense.

InterestExpenseDebt.label: Interest Expense, Debt
InterestExpenseDebt.description: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense for debt.

InterestExpenseOther.label: Interest Expense, Other
InterestExpenseOther.description: Amount of interest expense classified as other.

InterestExpenseOtherLongTermDebt.label: Interest Expense, Other Long-term Debt
InterestExpenseOtherLongTermDebt.description: Amount of interest expense incurred on long-term debt classified as other, including, but not limited to, interest on long-term notes and amortization of issuance costs.

InterestExpenseRelatedParty.label: Interest Expense, Related Party
InterestExpenseRelatedParty.description: Amount of interest expense incurred on a debt or other obligation to related party.

InterestExpenseSubordinatedNotesAndDeben.label: Interest Expense, Subordinated Notes and Debentures
InterestExpenseSubordinatedNotesAndDeben.description: Interest expense incurred during the reporting period on subordinated notes and debentures. Includes amortization of expenses incurred in the issuance of subordinated notes and debentures.

InterestPaid.label: Interest Paid, Including Capitalized Interest, Operating and Investing Activities
InterestPaid.description: Amount of cash paid for interest, including, but not limited to, capitalized interest and payment to settle zero-coupon bond attributable to accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount; classified as operating and investing activities.

InterestPaidCapitalized.label: Interest Paid, Capitalized, Investing Activities
InterestPaidCapitalized.description: Amount of cash paid for interest capitalized, classified as investing activity.

InterestPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Interest Payable
InterestPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Amount of interest payable on debt, including, but not limited to, trade payables.

InterestReceivable.label: Interest Receivable
InterestReceivable.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of interest earned but not received. Also called accrued interest or accrued interest receivable.

InvestmentCompanyDistributionToSharehold.label: Investment Company, Distribution to Shareholders, Per Share
InvestmentCompanyDistributionToSharehold.description: Per share or unit amount of distribution to shareholders. Includes, but is not limited to, dividend and capital gain. Excludes distribution for tax return of capital.

InvestmentCompanyFinancialSupportToInves.label: Investment Company, Financial Support to Investee Contractually Required, Amount
InvestmentCompanyFinancialSupportToInves.description: Amount of financial support committed by investment company to investee that is contractually required.

InvestmentCompanyNetAssetValuePerSharePe.label: Investment Company, Net Asset Value Per Share, Period Increase (Decrease)
InvestmentCompanyNetAssetValuePerSharePe.description: Per share or unit amount of increase (decrease) in net asset value.

InvestmentCompanyTaxReturnOfCapitalDistr.label: Investment Company, Tax Return of Capital Distribution
InvestmentCompanyTaxReturnOfCapitalDistr.description: Amount of distribution in excess of tax-basis earnings and profit of investment company.

InvestmentCompanyTaxReturnOfCapitalDistr.label: Investment Company, Tax Return of Capital Distribution, Per Share
InvestmentCompanyTaxReturnOfCapitalDistr.description: Per share or unit amount of capital distribution in excess of tax basis earnings.

InvestmentIncomeNetAmortizationOfDiscoun.label: Investment Income, Net, Amortization of Discount and Premium
InvestmentIncomeNetAmortizationOfDiscoun.description: Amount of accretion (amortization) of purchase discount (premium) on nonoperating securities.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, after Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease due after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year One
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Two
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRem.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Remainder of Fiscal Year
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRem.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease having initial or remaining lease term in excess of one year to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year.

Liabilities.label: Liabilities
Liabilities.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all liabilities that are recognized. Liabilities are probable future sacrifices of economic benefits arising from present obligations of an entity to transfer assets or provide services to other entities in the future.

LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.label: Liabilities and Equity
LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.description: Amount of liabilities and equity items, including the portion of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests, if any.

LineOfCredit.label: Long-term Line of Credit
LineOfCredit.description: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the current and noncurrent portions of long-term obligations drawn from a line of credit, which is a bank's commitment to make loans up to a specific amount. Examples of items that might be included in the application of this element may consist of letters of credit, standby letters of credit, and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a maximum amount as of any point in time conditional on satisfaction of specified terms before, as of and after the date of drawdowns on the line. Includes short-term obligations that would normally be classified as current liabilities but for which (a) postbalance sheet date issuance of a long term obligation to refinance the short term obligation on a long term basis, or (b) the enterprise has entered into a financing agreement that clearly permits the enterprise to refinance the short-term obligation on a long term basis and the following conditions are met (1) the agreement does not expire within 1 year and is not cancelable by the lender except for violation of an objectively determinable provision, (2) no violation exists at the BS date, and (3) the lender has entered into the financing agreement is expected to be financially capable of honoring the agreement.

LineOfCreditFacilityAverageOutstandingAm.label: Line of Credit Facility, Average Outstanding Amount
LineOfCreditFacilityAverageOutstandingAm.description: Average amount borrowed under the credit facility during the period.

LineOfCreditFacilityPeriodicPaymentInter.label: Line of Credit Facility, Periodic Payment, Interest
LineOfCreditFacilityPeriodicPaymentInter.description: Amount of the required periodic payment applied to interest.

LineOfCreditFacilityRemainingBorrowingCa.label: Line of Credit Facility, Remaining Borrowing Capacity
LineOfCreditFacilityRemainingBorrowingCa.description: Amount of borrowing capacity currently available under the credit facility (current borrowing capacity less the amount of borrowings outstanding).

LoansAndLeasesReceivableAllowance.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Allowance
LoansAndLeasesReceivableAllowance.description: Amount of allowance to cover probable credit losses on loans and leases. Includes carryover of or adjustments to the allowance for loan losses in connection with business combinations. Excludes allowance for loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableGrossCarryingAmo.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross
LoansAndLeasesReceivableGrossCarryingAmo.description: Amount before allowance of loans and leases held in portfolio, including but not limited to, commercial and consumer loans. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetReportedAmoun.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Net Amount
LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetReportedAmoun.description: Amount after allowance and deduction of deferred interest and fees, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts, of loans and leases held in portfolio, including but not limited to, commercial and consumer loans. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements and loans held for sale.

LoansPayable.label: Loans Payable
LoansPayable.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, aggregate carrying value as of the balance sheet date of loans payable (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).

LoansReceivableFairValueDisclosure.label: Loans Receivable, Fair Value Disclosure
LoansReceivableFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of loan receivable, including, but not limited to, mortgage loans held for investment, finance receivables held for investment, policy loans on insurance contracts.

LongTermDebt.label: Long-term Debt
LongTermDebt.description: Amount, after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

LongTermDebtFairValue.label: Long-term Debt, Fair Value
LongTermDebtFairValue.description: The fair value amount of long-term debt whether such amount is presented as a separate caption or as a parenthetical disclosure. Additionally, this element may be used in connection with the fair value disclosures required in the footnote disclosures to the financial statements. The element may be used in both the balance sheet and disclosure in the same submission.

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, after Year Five
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year One
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Five
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Four
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Three
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Two
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Remainder of Fiscal Year
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in remainder of current fiscal year.

ManagementFeeExpense.label: Management Fee Expense
ManagementFeeExpense.description: Amount of expenses related to the managing member or general partner for management of the day-to-day business functions of the limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP).

MarketableSecurities.label: Marketable Securities
MarketableSecurities.description: Amount of investment in marketable security.

MarketableSecuritiesRealizedGainLoss.label: Marketable Securities, Realized Gain (Loss)
MarketableSecuritiesRealizedGainLoss.description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in marketable security, including other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).

MarketableSecuritiesUnrealizedGainLoss.label: Marketable Securities, Unrealized Gain (Loss)
MarketableSecuritiesUnrealizedGainLoss.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in marketable security.

MortgageLoansOnRealEstate.label: SEC Schedule, 12-29, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Mortgage Loans on Real Estate
MortgageLoansOnRealEstate.description: Amount of investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities, including discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from investing activities, including discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, including discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.label: Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Basic
NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities; of income (loss) available to common shareholders.

NetIncomeLossFromRealEstateInvestmentPar.label: Net Income (Loss) from Real Estate Investment Partnership
NetIncomeLossFromRealEstateInvestmentPar.description: Amount of net income (loss) recognized from investments in real estate partnerships and variable interest entities.

NoninterestExpenseDirectorsFees.label: Noninterest Expense Directors Fees
NoninterestExpenseDirectorsFees.description: Noninterest expense related to directors' fees which are fees paid by an Entity to its directors. Directors' fees may be paid in addition to salary and other benefits.

NotesReceivableGross.label: Financing Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss
NotesReceivableGross.description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable.

OperatingExpenses.label: Operating Expenses
OperatingExpenses.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Includes selling, general and administrative expense.

OperatingIncomeLoss.label: Operating Income (Loss)
OperatingIncomeLoss.description: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

OperatingLeaseExpense.label: Operating Lease, Expense
OperatingLeaseExpense.description: Amount of operating lease expense. Excludes sublease income.

OperatingLeaseLiability.label: Operating Lease, Liability
OperatingLeaseLiability.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease.

OperatingLeasePayments.label: Operating Lease, Payments
OperatingLeasePayments.description: Amount of cash outflow from operating lease, excluding payments to bring another asset to condition and location necessary for its intended use.

OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.label: Operating Lease, Right-of-Use Asset
OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.description: Amount of lessee's right to use underlying asset under operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future minimum rental payments in aggregate as of the balance sheet date under operating leases.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, Current
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future rental payments receivable within one year of the balance sheet date under an operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, in Five Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future rental payments receivable within the fifth year from the balance sheet date under an operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, in Four Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future rental payments receivable within the fourth year from the balance sheet date under an operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, in Three Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future rental payments receivable within the third year from the balance sheet date under an operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, in Two Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future rental payments receivable within the second year from the balance sheet date under an operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, Remainder of Fiscal Year
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments receivable in the remainder of the fiscal year following the latest fiscal year ended for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable letter-terms in excess of one year.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, Thereafter
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future minimum lease payments receivable under operating leases for periods greater than five years following the balance sheet date.

OtherAmortizationOfDeferredCharges.label: Amortization of Other Deferred Charges
OtherAmortizationOfDeferredCharges.description: Amount of amortization of other deferred costs recognized in the income statement.

OtherAssets.label: Other Assets
OtherAssets.description: Amount of assets classified as other.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), before Adjustment, after Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.description: Amount, after tax and before adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), after Adjustment, before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.description: Amount, before tax and after adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), after Adjustment and Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.description: Amount, after tax and adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Sale of Securities, before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Sale of Securities, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Sale of Securities, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeOtherNetOfTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income, Other, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeOtherNetOfTax.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in other comprehensive income, after tax, from changes classified as other.

OtherCostAndExpenseOperating.label: Other Cost and Expense, Operating
OtherCostAndExpenseOperating.description: The total amount of other operating cost and expense items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operation.

OtherExpenseFromRealEstatePartnershipOpe.label: Other Expense from Real Estate Partnership Operations
OtherExpenseFromRealEstatePartnershipOpe.description: Amount of selling, general, and administrative expenses, and other expenses, related to investments in real estate partnerships.

OtherGeneralExpense.label: Other General Expense
OtherGeneralExpense.description: Amount of general expenses not normally included in Other Operating Costs and Expenses.

OtherLiabilities.label: Other Liabilities
OtherLiabilities.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other.

OtherLiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure.label: Other Liabilities, Fair Value Disclosure
OtherLiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of other liabilities.

OtherLongTermDebt.label: Other Long-term Debt
OtherLongTermDebt.description: Amount of long-term debt classified as other.

OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Income (Expense)
OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherOperatingIncome.label: Other Operating Income
OtherOperatingIncome.description: The total amount of other operating income, the components of which are not separately disclosed on the income statement, from items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operation.

OtherRevenueExpenseFromRealEstateOperati.label: Other Revenue (Expense) from Real Estate Operations
OtherRevenueExpenseFromRealEstateOperati.description: Amount of other revenue (expense) derived from real estate investments partnerships.

PaidInKindInterest.label: Paid-in-Kind Interest
PaidInKindInterest.description: Interest paid other than in cash for example by issuing additional debt securities. As a noncash item, it is added to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

ParticipatingMortgageLoansMortgageObliga.label: Participating Mortgage Loans, Mortgage Obligations, Amount
ParticipatingMortgageLoansMortgageObliga.description: The aggregate amount of the participating mortgage obligation at the end of the accounting period.

ParticipatingMortgageLoansParticipationL.label: Participating Mortgage Loans, Participation Liabilities, Amount
ParticipatingMortgageLoansParticipationL.description: The aggregate amount of the participation liability at the end of the accounting period.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.label: Payments for Repurchase of Common Stock
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.description: The cash outflow to reacquire common stock during the period.

PaymentsOfDividendsCommonStock.label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Common Stock
PaymentsOfDividendsCommonStock.description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends to common shareholders of the parent entity.

PaymentsOfFinancingCosts.label: Payments of Financing Costs
PaymentsOfFinancingCosts.description: The cash outflow for loan and debt issuance costs.

PaymentsToAcquireLoansHeldForInvestment.label: Payments to Acquire Loans Held-for-investment
PaymentsToAcquireLoansHeldForInvestment.description: The cash outflow associated with purchasing loans held for investment purposes during the period.

PaymentsToAcquireMarketableSecurities.label: Payments to Acquire Marketable Securities
PaymentsToAcquireMarketableSecurities.description: Amount of cash outflow for purchase of marketable security.

PaymentsToAcquirePartnersInterestInRealE.label: Payments to Acquire Partners Interest in Real Estate Partnership, Net of Cash Acquired
PaymentsToAcquirePartnersInterestInRealE.description: The cash outflow from the purchase of ownership in a partnership, the purpose of which is to construct, sell, hold or invest in real estate.

PreferredStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.label: Preferred Stock, Par or Stated Value Per Share
PreferredStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.description: Face amount or stated value per share of preferred stock nonredeemable or redeemable solely at the option of the issuer.

PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Authorized
PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.description: The maximum number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.

PreferredStockSharesIssued.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Issued
PreferredStockSharesIssued.description: Total number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) issued to shareholders (includes related preferred shares that were issued, repurchased, and remain in the treasury). May be all or portion of the number of preferred shares authorized. Excludes preferred shares that are classified as debt.

PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Outstanding
PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.description: Aggregate share number for all nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by stockholders. Does not include preferred shares that have been repurchased.

PreferredStockValue.label: Preferred Stock, Value, Issued
PreferredStockValue.description: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable preferred shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

PreferredStockValueOutstanding.label: Preferred Stock, Value, Outstanding
PreferredStockValueOutstanding.description: Value of all nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by shareholders, which is net of related treasury stock. May be all or a portion of the number of preferred shares authorized. These shares represent the ownership interest of the preferred shareholders.

PrepaymentFeesOnAdvancesNet.label: Prepayment Fees on Advances, Net
PrepaymentFeesOnAdvancesNet.description: Amount of income earned, after hedging basis adjustments, from fees charged for prepayment of certain Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) advances before original maturity.

PrincipalAmountOutstandingOfLoansHeldInP.label: Principal Amount Outstanding of Loans Held-in-portfolio
PrincipalAmountOutstandingOfLoansHeldInP.description: This is the result of the principal amount outstanding of total loans managed or securitized less securitized loans and loans that are in the process of being securitized.

ProceedsFromEquityMethodInvestmentDivide.label: Proceeds from Equity Method Investment, Distribution, Return of Capital
ProceedsFromEquityMethodInvestmentDivide.description: Amount of distribution received from equity method investee for return of investment, classified as investing activities. Excludes distribution for return on investment, classified as operating activities.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.description: The cash inflow from the additional capital contribution to the entity.

ProceedsFromLinesOfCredit.label: Proceeds from Lines of Credit
ProceedsFromLinesOfCredit.description: Amount of cash inflow from contractual arrangement with the lender, including but not limited to, letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements.

ProceedsFromLoanAndLeaseOriginationsAndP.label: Proceeds from Loan and Lease Originations and Principal Collections
ProceedsFromLoanAndLeaseOriginationsAndP.description: Cash inflow related to a loan origination (the process when securing a mortgage for a piece of real property), lease origination, and principal collections.

ProceedsFromLoanOriginations1.label: Proceeds from Loan Originations
ProceedsFromLoanOriginations1.description: Cash inflow associated with loan origination (the process when securing a mortgage for a piece of real property) or lease origination.

ProceedsFromPaymentsForInSecuritiesSoldU.label: Proceeds from (Payments for) in Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase
ProceedsFromPaymentsForInSecuritiesSoldU.description: The cash flow from investments sold under the agreement to repurchase such investment.

ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.label: Proceeds from Related Party Debt
ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.description: The cash inflow from a long-term borrowing made from related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Proceeds from Advances from Affiliates.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfDebt.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Debt
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfDebt.description: The net cash inflow or outflow in aggregate debt due to repayments and proceeds from additional borrowings.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfSecuredDebt.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Secured Debt
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfSecuredDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from long-term debt wholly or partially secured by collateral. Excludes tax exempt secured debt.

ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfMarketableS.label: Proceeds from Sale and Maturity of Marketable Securities
ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfMarketableS.description: The cash inflow associated with the aggregate amount received by the entity through sale or maturity of marketable securities (held-to-maturity or available-for-sale) during the period.

ProceedsFromSaleOfLeaseReceivables.label: Proceeds from Sale of Lease Receivables
ProceedsFromSaleOfLeaseReceivables.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of receivables arising from the lease of real estate, equipment or other fixed assets for a specified time in exchange for payment, usually in the form of rent; excludes proceeds from sales-type lease transactions, which are classified as operating activities.

ProceedsFromUnsecuredNotesPayable.label: Proceeds from Unsecured Notes Payable
ProceedsFromUnsecuredNotesPayable.description: The cash inflow from borrowings supported by a written promise to pay an obligation that is uncollateralized (where debt is not backed by the pledge of collateral).

ProfessionalFees.label: Professional Fees
ProfessionalFees.description: A fee charged for services from professionals such as doctors, lawyers and accountants. The term is often expanded to include other professions, for example, pharmacists charging to maintain a medicinal profile of a client or customer.

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

PropertyManagementFeePercentFee.label: Property Management Fee, Percent Fee
PropertyManagementFeePercentFee.description: The percentage charged for managing real estate properties.

ProvisionForLeaseLosses.label: Provision for Lease Losses
ProvisionForLeaseLosses.description: Amount of expense related to estimated loss to be realized from lease transactions.

ProvisionForLoanAndLeaseLosses.label: Provision for Loan and Lease Losses
ProvisionForLoanAndLeaseLosses.description: Amount of expense related to estimated loss from loan and lease transactions.

ProvisionForLoanLeaseAndOtherLosses.label: Provision for Loan, Lease, and Other Losses
ProvisionForLoanLeaseAndOtherLosses.description: Amount of expense related loan transactions, lease transactions, credit loss from transactions other than loan and lease transactions, and other loss based on assessment of uncollectability from the counterparty to reduce the account to their net realizable value.

ProvisionForLoanLossesExpensed.label: Financing Receivable, Credit Loss, Expense (Reversal)
ProvisionForLoanLossesExpensed.description: Amount of credit loss expense (reversal of expense) for financing receivable.

RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciation.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Accumulated Depreciation
RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciation.description: Amount of accumulated depreciation pertaining to real estate investments for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateAcquisitionsThroughForeclosure.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Acquisition Through Foreclosure
RealEstateAcquisitionsThroughForeclosure.description: Amount of real estate investments acquired through foreclosure for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCarr.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Building and Improvements, Amount
RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCarr.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of buildings and improvements for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate. Excludes real estate not held as an investment or interest.

RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCarr.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Land, Amount
RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCarr.description: Amount of land for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate. Excludes real estate not held as an investment or interest.

RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCost.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Cost Capitalized Subsequent to Acquisition, Improvements
RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCost.description: Amount of land and buildings and improvements made to real estate investments and capitalized after acquisition for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationInit.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Initial Cost of Building and Improvements
RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationInit.description: Initial cost of buildings and improvements for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate. Excludes real estate not held as an investment or interest.

RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationInit.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Initial Cost of Land
RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationInit.description: Initial cost of land for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate. Excludes real estate not held as an investment or interest.

RealEstateGrossAtCarryingValue.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Gross
RealEstateGrossAtCarryingValue.description: Amount, before accumulated depreciation, of real estate investment by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate. Excludes real estate not held as investment or interest.

RealEstateImprovements.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Improvements
RealEstateImprovements.description: Amount of increase in real estate investments related to improvements for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateInventoryCapitalizedInterestCo.label: Real Estate Inventory, Capitalized Interest Costs, Period Increase (Decrease)
RealEstateInventoryCapitalizedInterestCo.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in capitalized interest costs in real estate inventory.

RealEstateInvestmentPropertyNet.label: Real Estate Investment Property, Net
RealEstateInvestmentPropertyNet.description: Amount of real estate investment property, net of accumulated depreciation, which may include the following: (1) land available-for-sale; (2) land available-for-development; (3) investments in building and building improvements; (4) tenant allowances; (5) developments in-process; (6) rental properties; and (7) other real estate investments.

RealizedInvestmentGainsLosses.label: Realized Investment Gains (Losses)
RealizedInvestmentGainsLosses.description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment.

ReceivableWithImputedInterestDiscount.label: Receivable with Imputed Interest, Discount
ReceivableWithImputedInterestDiscount.description: Disclosure of the unamortized amount of the discount on the note or receivable which is deducted from the face amount of the receivable or loan. The discount or premium is the difference between the present value and the face amount.

RelatedPartyTransactionExpensesFromTrans.label: Related Party Transaction, Expenses from Transactions with Related Party
RelatedPartyTransactionExpensesFromTrans.description: Expenses recognized resulting from transactions (excluding transactions that are eliminated in consolidated or combined financial statements) with related party.

RepaymentsOfDebt.label: Repayments of Debt
RepaymentsOfDebt.description: The cash outflow during the period from the repayment of aggregate short-term and long-term debt. Excludes payment of capital lease obligations.

RepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.label: Repayments of Lines of Credit
RepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.description: Amount of cash outflow for payment of an obligation from a lender, including but not limited to, letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements.

RepaymentsOfLongTermDebtAndCapitalSecuri.label: Repayment of Long-term Debt, Long-term Lease Obligation, and Capital Security
RepaymentsOfLongTermDebtAndCapitalSecuri.description: Amount of cash outflow for debt, mandatory redeemable security, and principal payment for finance lease obligation.

RepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.label: Repayments of Related Party Debt
RepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.description: The cash outflow for the payment of a long-term borrowing made from a related party where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Payments for Advances from Affiliates.

RepaymentsOfSecuredDebt.label: Repayments of Secured Debt
RepaymentsOfSecuredDebt.description: The cash outflow to repay long-term debt that is wholly or partially secured by collateral. Excludes repayments of tax exempt secured debt.

RepurchaseAgreementsInterestExpenseAmoun.label: Repurchase Agreements, Interest Expense Amount
RepurchaseAgreementsInterestExpenseAmoun.description: This is the amount of interest expense incurred during the reporting period as a result of repurchase agreements.

RestrictedCash.label: Restricted Cash
RestrictedCash.description: Amount of cash restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits.

RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.label: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents
RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForFina.label: Right-of-Use Asset Obtained in Exchange for Finance Lease Liability
RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForFina.description: Amount of increase in right-of-use asset obtained in exchange for finance lease liability.

SECScheduleIIIRealEstateAccumulatedDepre.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Accumulated Depreciation, Depreciation Expense
SECScheduleIIIRealEstateAccumulatedDepre.description: Amount of depreciation expense of real estate investments for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

SECScheduleIIIRealEstateInvestmentProper.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Investment Property, Net
SECScheduleIIIRealEstateInvestmentProper.description: Amount after accumulated depreciation of real estate held for investment for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.
